data: Privacy Policy

You can use our services in a variety of ways to use SimCam AI camera software products, services, etc. on different terminals. Share content with others, etc. For this purpose, we will explain how we collect, process and use the information and how you can protect your privacy.
When we collect data.

When you interact with WuHan SimShine Intelligent Technology Co.,Ltd. and its branches (hereinafter referred to as " SimShine " or "we") and operating cooperation units (hereinafter referred to as "cooperative units"), you may be asked whether you agree Provide the information necessary to use our basic product services. This information may be linked or merged with other information and used to improve our products or services.
Below are some examples of the types of information that SimShine may collect and how we use it.
How we collect data

When you add a SimCam account, download and update SimShine software, register at an online retail store, participate in an online survey, or participate in other interactions with SimShine, we will ask you for information, including name, phone number, email address, geographic address and email address, etc.

data: Collection and use of information on minors

Minors should use SimShine products or services under the license and guidance of their legal representatives. SimShine does not collect personal information when it knows that the other party is a minor, nor does it disclose its personal information to any third party. The legal representative has the right to refuse SimShine and its affiliates to further collect information about minors. Alternatively, ask SimShine and its affiliates to delete the minor information. If we find that we have collected information about minors without the consent of our legal representative, we will take steps to remove such information as soon as possible.

Our legal bases for processing information

SimShine will process and utilize your information in strict compliance with the provisions of this Privacy Policy and its updates. Your information will only be used for purposes and scope as determined at the time of collection and with your consent, and we will obtain your consent in advance for any other purpose.

The information we collect may be used to provide you with SimShine products and services, to process your order or to fulfill your contract with SimShine to ensure the functionality and security of our products and services, to verify your identity, Prevent and investigate fraud or other improper use.
The information we collect may be used in the development of our products and services, although in general we use only comprehensive and statistical information for this purpose.
The information we collect may be used to communicate with you, for example, to notify you when the SimShine product or service is updated or released.

The information we collect may be used to personalize the product and provide you with a more personal service, such as recommending in our services, displaying content and advertisements created for you, or for the city.
If you participate in a sweepstakes, contest or similar promotion organized by SimShine, we may use the information you provide to manage such events.

Your smart camera's hardware identifier and geographic location information can be used to activate your warranty service and specific software licenses, and may invite you to participate in the market. We also use this information to improve our products and analyze the efficiency of our business operations. However, we will not use this information to track your location.

Information we collect such as occupations, languages, postal codes, and time zones in which SimCam AI products are used can help us better understand user behavior and improve our products, services, and publicity.
How users choose whether to provide information
Everyone has a different focus on privacy, and based on this, we will clearly indicate how we collect information so that you can choose how to receive it.

You can modify the positioning settings of your device from the device settings, such as changing or disabling the positioning method or positioning the server, or modifying the accuracy of your location information to change the location information provided to SimShine.
You can modify your browser settings to refuse or accept cookies, delete them from your storage device at any time, or notify you when you write cookies.
View and update the information
By logging into your account, you can view and update your information. You can also delete some information or ask us to delete your personal account unless we have to keep it for legal purposes.

Whenever you use our services, we strive to allow you to see and check your information. If this information is incorrect, we will endeavor to allow you to quickly update or delete the information in a variety of ways (unless we have to retain it for legal purposes). When updating your personal information, we may ask you to verify your identity before processing your request.
We may reject requests that are unreasonably repetitive, risky or otherwise unrealistic to others' privacy. If your request does not meet the requirements of the Administration, we must reject it.

As long as you do not have to invest too much, we can provide you with free access to view and modify information. We strive to maintain the service to protect it from accidental or malicious damage. Therefore, when you delete information from our services, we may not immediately remove residual copies of this information from the server that is being operated or in operation, or may not delete the corresponding information from the backup system.
Information security
We strive to protect the users of SimShine from unauthorized viewing, access, tampering, disclosure or destruction. To this end, we have taken the following measures in particular:
We use SSL to encrypt many services.
We review practices in information collection, storage, and processing (including physical security measures) to avoid unauthorized access or access and malicious attacks on various systems.

We only allow SimShine employees, who need to know the information in order to help us process the information, the person who handle the service company are browsing the personal information, and they need to fulfill strict contractual confidentiality obligations. If they fail to fulfill these obligations, they will May be held liable or terminated from SimShine.

The security of your information is very important for us. Therefore, we will continue to work hard to protect your information and implement safeguards such as storage and transmission of full security encryption to prevent your information from being viewed, used or disclosed without authorization. At the same time, the specific content of some encrypted data, except the user himself, has no right to view.
Scope of the privacy policy

Our privacy policy does not apply to third party products and/or services. SimCam AI camera products and services may contain third-party products and services. When you use third-party products or accept third-party services, they may obtain your information. Therefore, we hereby remind you to read the third-party privacy policy in detail.
At the same time, this Privacy Policy does not apply to the collection of information on external websites after you click on the link.
Revision of this Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy allows for adjustments and we will not diminish your rights under this Privacy Policy without your express consent, unless you send a notice or post a website announcement via the email address you provided.
